title: Requires SUNY and CUNY authorities to install and retrofit buildings with sprinkler systems
summary: Requires SUNY and CUNY authorities, the board of trustees, to adopt rules to require the installing and retrofitting of dormitory buildings with sprinkler systems on or before March first, two thousand fourteen.

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation  to  requiring  SUNY  and
         CUNY  authorities  to  install  and  retrofit dormitory buildings with
         sprinkler systems

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The board of trustees of the state university of New York,
    2  the board of trustees of the city university of New York and the council
    3  of governing boards for the  independent  colleges  of  New  York  shall
    4  conduct a study concerning the safety of New York state college students
    5  in  dormitories, fraternities, sororities, laboratories, physical educa-
    6  tion facilities, dining facilities, educational  facilities  and  recre-
    7  ational  facilities. This study shall include information including, but
    8  not limited to, the number and percentage of buildings without  adequate
    9  fire  extinguishment  equipment including, but not limited to, sprinkler
   10  systems, fire extinguishers, fire hoses and smoke alarms.  Additionally,
   11  an analysis of the cost of retrofitting existing facilities with  sprin-
   12  kler  systems  must  be provided along with a plan and time schedule for
   13  the completion of such retrofitting. A report containing the information
   14  required by this section shall be submitted  to  the  governor  and  the
   15  legislature not later than December 1, 2013.
   16    S  2.  Section  355  of  the  education law is amended by adding a new
   17  subdivision 20 to read as follows:
   18    20. PLAN FOR PROVIDING FIRE SAFETY. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF THE STATE
   19  UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK SHALL ADOPT RULES REQUIRING THAT EACH INSTITUTION
   20  OF THE STATE UNIVERSITY, ON OR BEFORE MARCH FIRST,  TWO  THOUSAND  FOUR-
   21  TEEN, ADOPT AND IMPLEMENT A PLAN TO CAUSE ALL BUILDINGS UNDER THE JURIS-
   22  DICTION  OF SUCH INSTITUTION CONTAINING DORMITORY FACILITIES FOR STUDENT
   23  USE TO BE CONSTRUCTED  OR  RETROFITTED  WITH  A  SYSTEM  OF  PIPING  AND

    7    S  3.  Section  6206  of  the education law is amended by adding a new
    8  subdivision 17 to read as follows:
    9    17. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF THE CITY UNIVERSITY  OF  NEW  YORK  SHALL
   10  ADOPT  RULES  REQUIRING THAT EACH INSTITUTION OF THE CITY UNIVERSITY, ON
   11  OR BEFORE MARCH FIRST, TWO THOUSAND FOURTEEN, ADOPT AND IMPLEMENT A PLAN
   12  TO CAUSE ALL  BUILDINGS  UNDER  THE  JURISDICTION  OF  SUCH  INSTITUTION
   13  CONTAINING  DORMITORY  FACILITIES  FOR  STUDENT USE TO BE CONSTRUCTED OR
   14  RETROFITTED WITH A SYSTEM OF PIPING AND APPURTENANCES, CONSISTENT WITH 9
   15  NYCRR 606.3(A)(194), DESIGNED AND INSTALLED IN ACCORDANCE WITH GENERALLY
   16  ACCEPTED STANDARDS SO THAT HEAT FROM A  FIRE  WILL  AUTOMATICALLY  CAUSE
   17  WATER  TO  BE DISCHARGED OVER SUCH FIRE AREA TO EXTINGUISH IT OR PREVENT
   18  ITS FURTHER SPREAD. ALL RETROFITTING SHALL BE COMPLETED WITHIN  A  THREE
   19  YEAR PERIOD FROM THE DATE ANY SUCH PLAN IS ADOPTED.
   20    S 4. This act shall take effect immediately.
